name: Game A Month 4 - Prototype
description:
Hey everyone! Welcome to my game a month 4 page. Game a month is a challenge to create a game within a month. I started quite late this month and what you see here is my first day of progress. I'll be updating the itch page and my YouTube channel over this week.

Update Notes
This is my first day of progress, I hope you enjoy the prototype!

Controls
W,A,S,D - Movement
Left Click - Fire Projectile
Space - Jump/Hold in air to hover
Right Click - Unknown Ability

Social Media
Twitter - https://twitter.com/Matthew_Palaje
Discord - https://discord.gg/D3QrbfD
